alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:01PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western St. Lucie, Okeechobee, Indian River and south central Brevard Counties through 845 PM EST... At 800 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fellsmere to Fort Drum to 8 miles south of Basinger. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sebastian, Vero Beach, Treasure Island, Okeechobee, and Fellsmere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for east central Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for east central Florida.
